content: Head back down to the pond, and you’ll find the waterway leads on a bit past several Croaky frog enemies, as well as a new kind of Rat standing by the shore. This Rat Governor wields an electric staff, which he can charge up and zap you from a distance with after a flourish, or perform a backwards jump to zap you in mid-air. If you take enough shock damage, you’ll reach a state where all incoming damage is doubled, so avoid these blasts at all costs and shut him down with Immobilize.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge'.
The content is as follows:
Head back down to the pond, and you’ll find the waterway leads on a bit past several Croaky frog enemies, as well as a new kind of Rat standing by the shore. This Rat Governor wields an electric staff, which he can charge up and zap you from a distance with after a flourish, or perform a backwards jump to zap you in mid-air. If you take enough shock damage, you’ll reach a state where all incoming damage is doubled, so avoid these blasts at all costs and shut him down with Immobilize.
